productsMain.title: Christmas Elf Set
productInfo: 1 elf(boy or girl) - you have the choice of a boy with shorts or with a tunic (please use drop down box to indicate your choice)
1 personalised letter from Father Christmas to explain to your child the purpose of the Elf's visit.
